alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 7:37PM CST until February 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farmland along the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Monday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 18.6 Mon 6 pm CST 18.9 18.8 18.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 745 AM CST.
